sourcesContent:
// import "./css/Privacy.css" import { useState } from "react"; import "./css/Accessibility.css" import L4 from "./img/DSC_6157.jpg" function Accessibility() { let openClass = 'topic-open'; const [isOpenButton1, setIsOpen] = useState(false); let openClass1 = 'answer'; if (!isOpenButton1) { openClass1 = 'close'; } const [isOpenButton2, setIsOpen2] = useState(false); let openClass2 = 'answer'; if (!isOpenButton2) { openClass2 = 'close'; } const [isOpenButton3, setIsOpen3] = useState(false); let openClass3 = 'answer'; if (!isOpenButton3) { openClass3 = 'close'; } return (

Transportation, Accommodation, Ticket Information

Click each branch to expand

By car

Duxford is in Cambridgeshire, off Junction 10 of the M11. If you are coming from the north, a signposted alternative is to leave at Junction 11 and take the A10 to Royston, then the A505. This is a much longer route bt it splits the traffic up.

The Post Code (for Sat Nav) is CB22 4QR but some systems will only recognise the older code CB2 4QR.

There are links to other route planners in the Travel Advice section.

By Train

The easiest (but not the closest) train station is Cambridge, which has a direct service from London.

Alternatives are Royston and Whittlesford Parkway, which is the closest to the show.

It is best to book as far as possible in advance. This is not only because nearby hotels and guest houses tend get booked up well before the date of an airshow but also because prices can be better when you book early online.

Please check, and change as necessary, the dates, number of rooms and number of guests.

There are three hotels near IWM Duxford for your choice.

  • £90 The John Barleycorn, 3 Moorfield Rd, Duxford, Cambridge CB22 4PP, +441223691411
  • £141 The Lodge, Ickleton Rd, Duxford, Cambridge CB22 4RT, +441223755677
  • £100 Holiday Inn Express Cambridge-Duxford, 42 Station Rd E, Whittlesford, Bridge, Cambridge CB22 4WL, +441223497070

£29.75 Adult Standard (aged 16 + years) Please add a parking permit to park at the event. Free event shuttle buses are available for all ticket holders.

£27.00 Standard Adult IWM Member (aged 16 + years) Please have your promo code ready to book your tickets. Please add a parking permit to park at the event. Free event shuttle buses are available for all ticket holders.

Free Standard Child (aged 15 years and under) Children go free when booked with a standard adult ticket. All children must be accompanied by an adult.

Free Personal Assistant All visitors with a disability can bring a personal assistant free of charge.

£5.00 Parking Permit Book parking before you proceed to checkout if you intend to park at the event.

£8.00 Pre-booked Programme Pre-purchase your programme to save £2 from on-the-day prices. IWM members receive 10% off programmes and merchandise.

Tickets will be booked soon, please be sure to buy tickets when they open.

"Bücker Bü 131 Jungmann is waiting for its turn to take off"

); } export default Accessibility;
